title: Saar Biotech-Dextromethorphan Hydrobromide + Phenylephrine Hydrochloride + Cetirizine Hydrochloride + Menthol Suspension|Third Party Manufacturing Pharmaceuticals
meta: Saar Biotech is a pharmaceutical company which is situated in Himachal Pradesh(Baddi).The combination of Dextromethorphan Hydrobromide,  Cetirizine, Hydrochloride, Phenylephrine and Menthol Suspension is used to treat headache, fever, body aches, runny or stuffy nose, sneezing, itching, watery eyes, and sinus congestion caused by allergies, the common cold, or the flu.
